CustomField.description: When an Attendee registers, they'll be auto-added to this Campaign as a Campaign Member. If they were added to the Event from a Campaign to start with the invite, their status will be updated (they won't be duplicated).
CustomField.inlineHelpText: When an Attendee registers, they'll be auto-added to this Campaign as a Campaign Member. If they were added to the Event from a Campaign to start with the invite, their status will be updated (they won't be duplicated).
CustomField.label: Campaign
